scripts.build:check: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build
scripts.deploy:quick: git add . && git commit -m "ðŸš€ Quick deploy $(date)" && git push origin main
scripts.deploy:force: git add . && git commit -m "ðŸš€ Force deploy $(date)" && git push origin main --force
scripts.deploy-patch: npm version patch && node scripts/build-info.js && git add public/build-info.json && git commit -m "Update build info for patch version" && git push origin main --tags
scripts.deploy-minor: npm version minor && node scripts/build-info.js && git add public/build-info.json && git commit -m "Update build info for minor version" && git push origin main --tags
scripts.deploy-major: npm version major && node scripts/build-info.js && git add public/build-info.json && git commit -m "Update build info for major version" && git push origin main --tags
